data.title: News and Gossip
data.text:
GoSsIP

New Hank and Gwen will become a couple which might mean Gwen will be Ethan's aunt (thanks to Hal!)

New Theresa will get murdered by Gwen. (Thanks to Mandy!)

New Theresa will become pregnant after her and Ethan sleep together for the first time and he then decides to stay with her for the sake of their child. (Thanks to Katie!)

David Mathiessen (ex-Leo Deschanel) will be playing the role of Noah Bennett, and Sam Brenhens (ex-Gregory from Sunset Beach) will be playing the role of Gwen's father.

Rumor has it that all-American hunk Mark-Paul Gosselar (ex-Zack, Saved By The Bell) could be moving to Passions this summer. A spokesperson for the show claims the rumor is "not true."

Frank Lomax will return, played by Paul Korver.

Elizabeth Hobgood will be taking over the role of Gwen Hotchkiss

There may be a murder mystery storyline this summer, as Reilly is planning on toning down the supernatural part of Passions, but not dissolve it completly. Looks like fate won't get this young female out of trouble this time.

From Soap Opera Digest: John Loprieno (ex-Cord, One Life To Live) is being bandied about to play the oldest Lopez-Fitzgerald son.

From Soap Opera Digest: Because the show will soon be taking Hank in a new direction, the buzz is that there will soon be a fresh-faced female to take him there.

NBC is considering expanding both Passions and Days to 90 minutes.

Antonio may be involved in a love triangle with Sheridan and Luis

The show is looking to add another physician who could lend much need support to a main character.

Ethan's "cousin" will come to town after the truth about him is revealed, and she will try to steal him away from Theresa.

Randy Spelling (ex-Sean, Sunset Beach) has been eyed to play the role of Jessica Bennett's crush.

Victoria Wyndham (ex-Rachel, AW) has been eyed for the role of Hecuba if Robin Strasser leaves in February.

Russell Lawrence is rumored to join the cast of Passions as Noah Bennett.

Martin Fitzgerald is somehow involved with Faith and Charity, possibly as Charity's father.

Christina Chambers (Maria from Sunset Beach) will be playing Luis' new love interest.

From Soap Opera Digest: A guy may be walking back into Gwen's life, but don't count on a romantic tie- it's her brother,who could be a possible love interest for Ethan's sister, Amanda, due to hit town soon.

From Soap Opera Digest: Ethan isn't the only one whose sister-Amanda- will soon be on the canvas. Theresa may be doing some sisterly bonding with Paloma.

The show may be interested in having Mary Elizabeth Winstead return as Jessica Bennett.

Gwen's father will be appearing soon!

The show is interested in casting a blond female named Amanda, who may be Ethan's sister and will show up once the truth about him comes out.

The producers are looking for someone to play a female Winthrop.

looking at teens to possibly play the recurring role of Paloma Lopez Fitzgerald.
